summary: THERE IS A LARGE CRACK IN THE DASHBOARD.  THE CRACK IS LOCATED OVER THE AREA OVER THE DRIVER'S AIR BAG WHICH IS A SAFETY CONCERN.  IF THE AIR BAG WOULD DEPLOY, BROKEN PIECES OF PLASTIC COULD HARM THE DRIVER AS THE SAFETY FEATURES ARE WEAKENED.  CRACK OCCURRED WHEN VEHICLE WAS PARKED IN A GARAGE.  NO ONE , NOTHING CAUSED THE DASHBOARD TO CRACK, IT IS A DEFECT.
